alert.note: Alert for Lehigh; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 12:57AM EST until January 17 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Morris and Warren. In Pennsylvania, Northampton and Lehigh. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures remain below freezing across the area as freezing rain continues. Temperatures will warm above freezing within the next couple hours and precipitation will change to all rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
